fields.title: Middle Python Developer
Junior Java Developer (Switch to Salesforce)
fields.description:
Requirements:

    Programming skills using Java, J2EE, JavaScript, SOAP / REST Web Services, XML, JSON
    Strong written and verbal communication skills
    Excellent problem solving and multi-tasking skills
    English — Intermediate levelWe offer:
    Comfortable office in the center of Odessa.
    Corporate English courses.
    Free lunches.
    Friendly team with great corporate culture.
    Opportunities for self-realization, professional and career growth.
    Team-building, social events
